description.narrative: Hans Merensky Holdings Proprietary Limited (HMH or the Company) is a South African vertically integrated natural resource company with over 60 years operating history in the forestry and sub-tropical fruit industries. The Company is the largest grower and exporter of avocados out of Africa, and a leading player in South Africas timber industry through its timber plantations and sawmilling operations. HMH is embarking on a capital expenditure program that will expand and upgrade its timber processing capacity and increase the production of avocados in existing markets as well as new markets.

The development impact of the project is expected to include: Employment creation: The Company has about 4,300 employees. The expansion of its operations and market position in South Africa and South America is expected to lead to the creation of more jobs. Rural Development: The project will make significant contribution to the development of rural communities in South Africa. Women Inclusion: The project will enhance inclusion as a significant number of the Company''s business units employ largely women. Increased tax and export revenue for government.

name.narrative: HMH is headquartered at 9 Eton Road, Parktown, Johannesburg, South Africa. The Groups site locations include: Limpopo province (South Africa) 10 700 ha of Eucalyptus plantations, 1 timber processing facility, 1 321 ha of avocado orchards with a packhouse, processing plants for avocado puree, dried mango, fruit juice, avocado oil and avocado ripening; Mpumalanga (South Africa) - 5 800 ha of mainly hard wood timber plantations; Kwa-Zulu Natal (South Africa) 40 700 ha of Pine plantations, 2 timber processing facility, 286 ha of avocado orchards with a packhouse and 1 processing plant for avocado oil; Eastern Cape (South Africa) 17 000 ha of Pine plantations and1 timber processing facility; Western Cape (South Africa) 1 avocado ripening facility; Kent (United Kingdom) avocado and exotic fruits ripening and distribution facilities; Rungis Zone Euro Delta (France) avocado and exotic fruits ripening and distribution facilities; Maasdijk (Holland) - avocado and exotic fruits distribution facilities; Peru 120 ha of existing and 390 ha of proposed avocado orchards through a joint venture; Columbia 1 proposed avocado packhouse; and Mexico 100 ha proposed avocado orchard.
